source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,569 to 10,473 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 317 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 476 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 135,029 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 202,554.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 30 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 2,445 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
